mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Marshall University Archives and Special Collections
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Construction of A.M.E. (African Methodist Episcopal) Church, n.d., black and white photograph. The note on the envelope has another word in front of the church name, it appears to be Margass, Mangas, Margans, but I could not find it on internet. Other photos in envelope appear to be of the "Glorious Church of God" of Huntington.
